text: Giulio Savelli (27 September 1941 â€“ 12 May 2020) was an Italian politician and publisher. He was born in Rome. Savelli was elected to the Chamber of Deputies as a member of Forza Italia. He was a deputy from 1996 and 2001. Savelli died on 12 May 2020 in Rome at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Publishers Category:Politicians from Rome
title: Giulio Savelli
